contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, without prejudice to any right Appellant may have, pursuant to Fajohn v. Com., Dep’t of Corrections, 547 Pa. 649, 692 A.2d 1067 (1997), to seek modification of his sentence nunc pro tunc in the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas.
